http-username.label: HTTP Username
http-username.help: Username used for basic HTTP authentication

http-password.label: HTTP Password
http-password.help: Password used for basic HTTP authentication

access-token.label: High Fidelity Access Token
access-token.help:
This is an access token generated on the My Tokens page of your High Fidelity account.
Generate a token with the 'domains' scope and paste it here.
This is required to associate this domain-server with a domain in your account.

id.label: Domain ID
id.help: This is your High Fidelity domain ID. If you do not want your domain to be registered in the High Fidelity metaverse you can leave this blank.
